actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for equipment which conserves irrigation water an additional 10 per centum investment tax credit.
short_title: Irrigation Water Conservation Tax Act of 1983

summary.text: Irrigation Water Conservation Tax Act of 1983 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide an additional ten percent investment tax credit for equipment which conserves farm irrigation water.

titles.title: Irrigation Water Conservation Tax Act of 1983
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for equipment which conserves irrigation water an additional 10 per centum investment tax credit.
